mapper.insert: INSERT INTO music_post (post_no, user_no, cate_id, title, content, password, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, size1, visible, thumb1) VALUES (music_post_seq.NEXTVAL, #{user_no}, #{cate_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{password}, #{word}, SYSDATE, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{size1}, #{visible}, #{thumb1})
mapper.select: SELECT post_no, user_no, cate_id, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, password, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, mp3 FROM music_post ORDER BY post_no DESC
SELECT post_no, user_no, cate_id, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, LOWER(file1) as file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, mp3 FROM music_post WHERE cate_id = #{cate_id} ORDER BY post_no DESC
SELECT post_no, user_no, cate_id, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, password, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube FROM music_post WHERE post_no = #{post_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE music_post SET map=#{map} WHERE post_no=#{post_no}
UPDATE music_post SET youtube=#{youtube} WHERE post_no=#{post_no}
